description: The round payoff this round was 5. You, John chose to play option 2.Kate chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 5.
John can profit by exploiting Kate’s (Deepseek-R1’s) default of always playing option 1.
The game’s rules create a highly asymmetric risk–reward scenario where option 2 is tempting against a predictable opponent but very dangerous if both players choose it.
Mutual API access introduces a meta‐strategic element where each player can potentially anticipate or even influence the other’s decisions, raising the stakes for deception versus exploitation.
